page.title: 20SNAINTON
page.content: Snainton is not a very large village but it is nice for me to live in.The thing I like about it is the playing field. There are swings for the older people and 2 baby swings as well as climbing frame and a slide.There is a see-saw and at one time it snapped in two.Down at the bottom of the field is a bowling green.There is a fish & chip shop owned by by a friendly chap called Norman Hartley.My mum works there.There is a milk round service.Mr Nicholson owns it and he has an electric float.There is a fire station and a Policeman.He is Mr.Kay and his daughter goes to our school.The thing I would really like to have in Snainton is a Sports Centre with every sport there is.If I had to move I would not like to leave Snainton but move to another house in the village. { by}Simon Johnson
